channel.title: Need Help Got A Problem In the Client
channel.description:
So Hi Guys, It's my first post.
So....... What I need help with is "My server is ok but when someone try to open it its stuck at loading client 1%"
How can I fix that? If anyone knows please Reply!
And Another Question how to add the Crowns? Ex.(The Owner crown=the crown beside his name)
Thx guys.

item.title: Need Help Got A Problem In the Client
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

[quote=“Craxx, post:7, topic:509314”][quote author=Lirimoo link=topic=627561.msg4264690#msg4264690 date=1363897459]

Are you hosting it on your computer?

Yeah

Be sure ip is 127.0.0.1
[/quote]

Even If I want people to play?
Because I already can play[/quote]For you to conect, it needs to be 127.0.0.1, for other people our of your LAN, it needs to be your IP or No-IP

Read full topic

item.title: Need Help Got A Problem In the Client
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

Make sure the server is running before you load the client as the server needs to bind to the port before the client can start loading.

Read full topic
